Package actors

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TwitterSearchActor
    Actor for retrieving tweets using TenTweetsForKeywordService.
    TwitterSearchActorProtocol
    Defines message protocol for a TwitterSearchActor
    TwitterSearchActorProtocol.Refresh
    A message to trigger refresh
    TwitterSearchActorProtocol.Search
    A message to carry search phrase
    TwitterSearchActorProtocolTest
    Tests the functionality of TwitterSearchSchedulerActorProtocol.
    TwitterSearchActorTest
    Tests the functionality of TwitterSearchActor.
    TwitterSearchSchedulerActor
    Actor that is notified by akka scheduling mechanism every given amount of time to trigger refresh of Twitter search results.
    TwitterSearchSchedulerActorProtocol
    Defines message protocol for a TwitterSearchSchedulerActor
    TwitterSearchSchedulerActorProtocol.RefreshAll
    A message to trigger refresh of all Actors
    TwitterSearchSchedulerActorProtocol.Register
    A message caries an Actor to register in TwitterSearchActor
    TwitterSearchSchedulerActorProtocolTest
    Tests the functionality of TwitterSearchSchedulerActorProtocol.
    TwitterSearchSchedulerActorTest
    Tests the functionality of TwitterSearchSchedulerActor.
